dcterms:creator: K. Yun
J. Honorio
D. Chattopadhyay
T. L. Berg
D. Samaras
dcterms:description: A dataset for two-person interaction recognition, created using Kinect, providing reliable RGBD data for each video. It consists of eight interactions (approaching, departing, pushing, kicking, punching, exchanging objects, hugging, and shaking hands), seven different participants, and a total of 282 short videos.
dcterms:title: SBU

dcterms:creator: M. S. Ryoo
J. K. Aggarwal
dcterms:description: A dataset that focuses on inter-person interaction, containing RGB information. It includes six different classes of actions (shake-hands, point, hug, push, kick, and punch) and is subdivided into two sets recorded under different conditions.
dcterms:title: UT-Interaction

dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T.-T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for 3D human activity analysis, containing 11 classes of mutual actions. It includes 10,347 videos collected with Kinect (V2) under challenging conditions, featuring 40 different subjects and large variations in viewpoints.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB + D

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
A. Shahroudy
M. Perez
G. Wang
L.-Y. Duan
A. C. Kot
dcterms:description: An extension of the NTU RGB+D dataset, containing 60 additional classes, including 15 mutual-action classes. It features 24,794 videos captured similarly to the previous version, with diverse subjects and viewpoints.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB + D 120
